titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices and council. A proclamation. Charles Porter, Tho: Coningesby. Whereas their Majesties by their royal proclamation, dated at their camp by Dublin the tenth day of July, 1690. ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Took printer to the King and Queen at their Majesties printing-house on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at the Council-Chamber in Dublin, the 23th day of February, 1690.".
The brass and copper coinage no longer current.--Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 201. Procla- said p.2) un- Mo-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
